HOME_CAROUSEL.SLIDE_1_PARAGRAPH: is a pioneer in the commercial exchange of agricultural products and the manufacturing industry of its locally, regionally, internationally and using the lastest technical means in the agricultural industry and its requirements while keeping development of the best scientific and commercial fields and working at the highest levels of professionalism and transparency in its business.
HOME_CAROUSEL.SLIDE_2_FIRST_PARAGRAPH: The steering committe of MUBADALA AGRICULTURE has reviewed the proposed strategic planning during the meeting held on 27th November 2019 and analysed the current status through highlighting SWOT analysis focusing on strengths and weaknesses and available resources. Accordingly formulating the vision and mission of the company and designing the strategies and corporate objectives to realize it and applicable performance measurements.

INTRODUCTION.BIG_HEADING: The steering committee of MUBADALA AGRICULTURE has reviewed the proposed strategic planning during the meeting held on 27th November 2019
INTRODUCTION.PARAGRAPH_1: Analysed the current status through highlighting  SWOT analysis focusing on strengths and weaknesses and available resources.
INTRODUCTION.PARAGRAPH_2: Accordingly  formulating the vision and mission of the company and designing the strategies and corporate  objectives to realize it and applicable performance measurements.
INTRODUCTION.PARAGRAPH_3: The committee satisfied and  approved the proposal, therefore the company announces to all stakeholders about the strategy  and look forward to total understanding of the objectives and mechanism of strategy and to streamline  all of our effects to adhere to it and realize its objectives.

MISSION.PARAGRAPH_1: Focusing on advanced agricultural techniques to support farmers in production processes and support them.
MISSION.PARAGRAPH_2: Contribute to ensuring high-quality food security locally, regionally and internationally and work to add value  to partners and society in general through:
MISSION.POINT_1: Working to increase the company's share in the local, Arab and international market.
MISSION.POINT_2: Business investment development and expansion of marketing outlets and creating a  competitive work environment for the company’s employees.
MISSION.POINT_3: Providing the highest standards of product quality and services to the company's clients.
MISSION.POINT_4: Apply the most suitable and modern commercial tracks, preserve the surrounding  environment, and work in social responsibility activities.

OBJECTIVES.OBJECTIVE_1: Securing the sustainable sources of the best agricultural products locally and globally.
OBJECTIVES.OBJECTIVE_2: Providing the best agricultural products in to the target markets.
OBJECTIVES.OBJECTIVE_3: Building investment partnerships to provide agricultural products and their requirements.
OBJECTIVES.OBJECTIVE_4: Focus on modern agricultural technologies in production and manufacturing.
OBJECTIVES.OBJECTIVE_5: Manufacturing the company's products according to the requirements of the local and  international market.

EXP.TITLE: Experience and Know-How in AGROBUSINESS

EXP.PARAGRAPH_2: Accordingly formulating the vision and mission of the company and designing the strategies and corporate objectives to realize it and applicable performance measurements.
